text: CLOSE Musicians including Taylor Swift, Ed Sheeran, Demi Lovato shine at the Jingle Bell Ball. ( Dec. 11 ) AP Singer Taylor Swift, seen performing at Madison Square Garden in December, tweeted Thursday that Charli XCX and Camila Cabello will open on her'Reputation'stadium tour. ( Photo : Evan Agostini, Invision / AP ) Taylor Swift Thursday added some singing firepower to her Reputation stadium tour, announcing that Charli XCX and Camila Cabello will perform as opening acts. The music superstar tweeted the news, along with a short, accompanying video, saying : ` ` I have a very exciting update to share... @ Camila _ Cabello and @ char
